!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Jul 15, 2003 15:11:30.106

Note that this does not occur when the text plugins (those in text.ap) from 
20030715 are loaded as binary projects into the workbench (rather than using 
HEAD).

The runnable posted by the QuickDiffToggleAction is consumed by the event loop 
of the modal dialog. The problem will be solved when having moved the 
intialization code to the editor. However, code posted should always be 
protected against intermediate changes.
*** Bug 40179 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
